function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Likelihood of additional transmission mechanisms in confined spaces with dense populations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement specific measures to improve ventilation, air quality, and hygiene in confined spaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C sterilization, touchless fixtures, and advanced HVAC systems","People":"Healthcare workers, passengers, waste collection workers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, transportation companies, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Potential transmission via fomites, aerosols, and faecal-oral route","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread through multiple transmission routes","Mitigation":"Implement targeted cleaning and disinfection protocols, improve sanitation, and promote hygiene practices","Technologies":"Anti-microbial surface coatings, disinfecting sprays, UV-C disinfection, and sanitation monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare workers, passengers, waste collection workers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, transportation companies, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Survival of SARS-CoV-2 on surfaces for several days","Impact":"Risk of infection from contaminated surfaces and materials","Mitigation":"Adopt strict infection control and hygiene standards for waste collection from affected households and facilities","Technologies":"Anti-microbial coatings, UV-C sterilization, and waste sterilization systems","People":"Healthcare workers, waste collection workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, waste management organizations"}]}
